column1: to life now and there is nothing that will change." Darcey says she has been "a real help" since her recovery. "I have been on a lot of drugs and I now have a lot of support from friends and family and I am still taking drugs to try to get off alcohol. "I have been through a lot of painkillers, I have been through a lot of physical challenges and I am still taking them. "I have been very conscious of my body and I have been taking medication to let me get off alcohol." Darcey says she has been "very lucky" Darcey has not had to suffer from the neck injury and that "some people will say things like "you are lucky you are here or you are lucky you are not injured". Darcey says she has been "really lucky to make it through this whole ordeal" Miss World has also been a huge help Darcey says she has been "very lucky" to have been able to see her father as he was in a coma "He was going through a lot of pain and I think he was going through a lot of pain too. "It was his own fault it was his own fault. "I don't know if I was the one who did it but I think it is more important than ever to find a way to get off alcohol and get off drugs. "I am grateful for all of my friends and family that I have had a chance to get off alcohol and get off drugs." Miss World says Darcey's story resonates with the other celebrities who have also shared their stories. "It has been a pleasure to participate in Miss World and to share the story of her life with other people and I am grateful for that," she says. Darcey says she has been "a real help" to other people after the accident. "I have been really lucky to make it through this whole ordeal" Miss World said "There have been a lot of people I have really been helping and going out and doing it for years.
